amendment.description: An amendment numbered 55 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce funding, by $28 million, for the for Minority AIDS prevention, and transfer the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for Office of the Secretary, General Departmental Management, by $28,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 324 (Roll no. 653).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 324 (Roll no. 653).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
